get.description: **NOTE**: Some systems only support returning a yearly balance. In that case, the EndDate parameter will be set to the last month of the financial year.

parameters.name: consentId
parameters.description: The consent for which you wish to list account balances.

parameters.name: EndDate
parameters.description: The end date that you wish to return account balances for, in the following format: "YYYY-MM-DD"

parameters.name: Count
parameters.description: The number of records that you want to return per page.

parameters.name: CurrentPage
parameters.description: The page that you want to return results for.

parameters.name: x-correlation-id
parameters.description: A unique GUID that can be used to track this request

200.description: OK

get.description:
**Note:**
The **Level** query parameter denotes the different categorizations between sets of chart of accounts. You can request deeper levels without any restrictions, but the response will be the most detailed levels that the setting for that country allows.
Each country has different standard depending on the accounting standard adopted.

In Sweden, the commonly adopted standard is BAS ([https://bas.se](https://bas.se)) which for balance sheet report comprises of 3 levels, for example in Sweden:
1. **Assets**
2. **Intangible Assets**
3. **Patents/Licenses**

In Finland, the commonly adopted standard is KILA ([https://tilit.info](https://tilit.info/)) which comprises of 4 levels.

parameters.description: The consent for which you wish to get balance sheet.

parameters.name: EndDate
parameters.description: The end date that you wish to return balance sheet for, in the following format: "YYYY-MM-DD"

parameters.name: Level
parameters.description: The level that you want to return results for.

parameters.name: x-correlation-id
parameters.description: A unique GUID that can be used to track this request

200.description: OK

401.description: Unauthorized

403.description: Forbidden

501.description: Not Implemented

get.description:
**Note:** System by system filtering depends on the capability of the corresponding system, API.1 will return following message should the corresponding system does not have the capability:
            
```$"Filtering by status {status} is not supported by {system}");```

parameters.name: consentId
parameters.description: The consent for which you wish to list invoices.

parameters.name: Count
parameters.description: The number of records that you want to return per page.

parameters.name: CurrentPage
parameters.description: The page that you want to return results for.

parameters.name: FromInvoiceDate
parameters.description: The start issue date that you wish to return invoices for, in the following format: "YYYY-MM-DD"

parameters.name: ToInvoiceDate
parameters.description: The end issue date that you wish to return invoices for, in the following format: "YYYY-MM-DD"

parameters.name: CreatedDateTime
parameters.description: The creation date and time that you wish to return invoices for, in the following format: "yyyy-MM-ddTHH:mm:ss"

parameters.name: ModifiedDateTime
parameters.description: The modification date and time that you wish to return invoices for, in the following format: "yyyy-MM-ddTHH:mm:ss"

parameters.name: OrderBy
parameters.description: The order in which you wish to return results.

parameters.name: Status
parameters.description:
The status that you wish to return invoices for.
            
|System|IsSold|Paid|Unpaid|Overdue|Cancelled|Unsent|
|-|-|-|-|-|-|-|
|Fortnox|NA|v|v|v|v|NA|
|Visma eAccounting|NA|v|v|v|NA|NA|
|Bjorn Lunden|NA|v|v|v|v|NA|
|Procountor|v|v|NA|NA|NA|v|
|Visma Netvisor|NA|v|v|v|v|v|
|Billy|NA|v|v|NA|NA|NA|
|Visma Dinero|NA|v|NA|v|NA|NA|
|Visma e-conomic|NA|v|v|v|NA|NA|
|Tripletex|NA|NA|NA|NA|NA|NA|
|Xero|NA|v|v|v|NA|v|

creditInvoiceIndicator.description: marker if the invoice is credit invoice / credit note

creditInvoiceDocumentReferences.description: list of references to the credited invoices or credit invoices

creditInvoiceIndicator.description: marker if the invoice is credit invoice / credit note

reference.description: identifier (invoice number) of the credited invoice, if it is a credit invoice

creditInvoiceDocumentReferences.description: list of references to the credited invoices or credit invoices

type.description:
type of financial dimensions:
- costCode -> cost center
- costBearer -> cost bearer
- project -> project

FinancialDimensionDto.description: >Financial dimension to assign financial granularity to the financial reports (usually cost center, projects, etc.)

buyerOrderId.description: Order number of the buyer(generated by customer's system)

sellerOrderId.description: Order number of the seller (generated by own system)

OrderReferenceDto.description: Reference of the order number that is invoiced from.

id.description: Unique ID generated by the system

reference.description: An identifier (invoice number) for the invoice, assigned by the sender

buyerReference.description: Reference for the buyer (usually buyer's purchase invoice number)

bookedInvoiceIndicator.description: Denote if the invoice is booked

cancelledInvoiceIndicator.description: Denote if the invoice is cancelled

isSent.description: Denote if the invoice is sent

isSold.description: Denote if the invoice is sold to the factoring company (for lending purposes)
